STIG
IIS6 Site 
Version: 6 
Release: 13 Benchmark Date: 28 Oct 2011
Unnamed: 7.2:
Rule Title:  The web document (home) directory must be on a separate partition from the web servers system files.
STIG ID: WG205 IIS6  Rule ID: SV-30041r2_rule  Vuln ID: V-3333
Unnamed: 7.17:
Rule Title:  Logs of web server access and errors must be established and maintained.
STIG ID: WG240 IIS6  Rule ID: SV-38065r1_rule  Vuln ID: V-2250
Unnamed: 7.18:
Rule Title:  The IIS web site permissions "Write" or "Script Source" must not be selected.
STIG ID: WA000-WI092 IIS6  Rule ID: SV-38020r1_rule  Vuln ID: V-13699
Unnamed: 7.19:
Rule Title:  The IIS web site permissions "Write" or "Script Source" must not be selected.
STIG ID: WA000-WI092 IIS6  Rule ID: SV-38020r1_rule  Vuln ID: V-13699
Unnamed: 7.20:
Rule Title:  The IIS web site permissions "Write" or "Script Source" must not be selected.
STIG ID: WA000-WI092 IIS6  Rule ID: SV-38020r1_rule  Vuln ID: V-13699
Unnamed: 7.21:
Rule Title:  Directory browsing must be disabled.
STIG ID: WA000-WI090 IIS6  Rule ID: SV-38016r1_rule  Vuln ID: V-6755
